name: Panya
description:
Press the fullscreen button in the bottom right corner of the game to go fullscreen Panya is a university  project created by:

Ben Silk (Me)  :)

Background

Made for a university portfolio project. The brief for this project was to create a complete mobile game with polished UI to an industry standard.

Initially, I spent 11 weeks out on another game (which I will never release!) where you play as an elephant who shoots snakes out of it's trunk. But that game ended up being too buggy and messy to continue.

So, with only a week left before the deadline, I decided to create an entirely new game from scratch....

And that's how Panya was born!

I have since added a bit of polish here and there and ported the game to multiple platforms.

Inspired by my girlfriend Madzia <3

Features
  • A generally relaxing atmosphere
  • Never-ending climbing
  • Wild obstacle dodging action
  • Several cute pandas
Future Plans

in the future, I might add some more emphasised replayability and upload it to hte android app store but I am content for now :)

Final words

If you come across any bugs or generally weird things please let me know so that I can address those issues.

Thank you for playing & I hope you find it as relaxing as I do!
